metadata.branchFocus: Coordination, leadership, and real-time data processing

description.short: Your mind is designed for parallel processing. You can perform two purely mental tasks at once without penalty.
description.player: Your processing core allows you to handle multiple information streams simultaneously, like listening to a conversation while analyzing a document.

effects.description: Perform two purely mental tasks simultaneously without penalty

metadata.branchFocus: Coordination, leadership, and real-time data processing

description.short: As an action, you can analyze a person, creature, or system.
description.player: Your analytical processors can rapidly assess the function, status, and capabilities of systems and living beings.

outcomes.10+: You get a clear summary of its function, status, and one strength or weakness.
outcomes.7-9: You get a partial reading or the info has a glitch.

description.short: You can transmit small, silent packets of information to any other linked individual within line of sight.
description.player: Through wireless data transmission, you can send images, short sentences, or coordinates silently to linked allies.

effects.description: Transmit small information packets (image, sentence, coordinates) to linked individuals in line of sight

description.short: You can deploy a small spherical drone for locating and retrieving records in the Central Archive.
description.player: A compact drone housed within your chassis can navigate the vast Central Archive to retrieve specific records.

effects.description: Deploy drone to locate and retrieve records from Central Archive

description.short: Establish a psychic network with up to five willing individuals for telepathic communication, granting a +1 synergy bonus on teamwork rolls.
description.player: You become a telepathic hub, linking up to five minds for instant communication and enhanced coordination. Enhances Data Relay to work with anyone in the network, regardless of range.

effects.description: +1 synergy bonus on teamwork rolls for networked individuals
Establish telepathic network with up to 5 willing individuals; upgrades Data Relay to unlimited range within network

description.short: As your entire action for a round, you can provide real-time analysis for your allies.
description.player: You dedicate all processing power to tactical analysis, granting your networked allies enhanced combat awareness.

effects.description: Each networked ally may re-roll one die on their next action (requires full action)

description.short: Your Network Hub's range is extended significantly (across a city district), and the synergy bonus for networked actions increases to +2.
description.player: Imperial command systems allow you to coordinate operations across vast distances with unprecedented efficiency.

effects.description: Network Hub range extends across city district; synergy bonus increases to +2

description.short: For one minute, allies in your network automatically treat their next roll as a 10+.
description.player: You assume direct control, flooding your network with perfect tactical data. However, you become immobile and defenseless. Any damage taken crashes the network, inflicting 2 Stun damage on you and every member.

effects.description: Networked allies automatically treat next roll as 10+

flaws.description: You are immobile and defenseless during Overmind
Any damage crashes network, inflicting 2 Stun on all members

description.short: Issue a command that resonates with the core programming of other Automata.
description.player: Ancient Imperial command protocols allow you to override the directives of lesser Automata, forcing compliance with Imperial authority.

outcomes.10+: You can force a target non-Imperial Automaton to perform (or refrain from) one immediate action.
outcomes.7-9: Partial compliance or the command is misinterpreted.

metadata.branchFocus: Knowledge, memory, and the 'truth' of causality

description.short: You have a perfect, incorruptible short-term memory. You can perfectly recall every sensory detail from the last scene.
description.player: Your memory banks preserve perfect sensory recordings of recent events, immune to corruption or decay.

effects.description: Perfect recall of all sensory details from the last scene

metadata.branchFocus: Knowledge, memory, and the 'truth' of causality

description.short: You can understand any writing no matter how cryptic, illegible or encoded if given enough time and context.
description.player: Advanced linguistic processors can decipher any written language or code given sufficient time and contextual data.

effects.description: Understand any writing (cryptic, illegible, or encoded) given time and context

description.short: You have an advantage on all Bureaucracy or Lore rolls made to research a topic, navigate an archive, or find a loophole in a legal/social system.
description.player: Your processing is optimized for navigating complex bureaucratic systems and vast archives of information. Possesses a basic Data Relay augment.

effects.description: Advantage on Bureaucracy/Lore rolls for research, archives, or finding loopholes

description.short: You can determine with a high probability of success if a work is a forgery or not.
description.player: Your pattern-matching algorithms can detect inconsistencies and anomalies that betray forgeries, as long as you have seen the original or a sample from the same source.

outcomes.10+: You definitively determine if the work is genuine or forged.
outcomes.7-9: You get a strong suspicion but cannot be certain.

description.short: You are a walking clock and compass. You always know the exact time and your precise global coordinates.
description.player: Internal chronometers and positioning systems provide perfect awareness of time and location. You may use your Lore skill in place of Wits when rolling for Initiative.

effects.description: Always know exact time and global coordinates
May use Lore instead of Wits for Initiative rolls

description.short: You can tap into the ancient Watcher satellite network to get a real-time overhead view of any single outdoor location for one minute.
description.player: Access codes allow you to interface with dormant Imperial surveillance satellites, though the network is degraded and unreliable.

outcomes.10+: Clear real-time overhead view of target location for one minute.
outcomes.7-9: Image is degraded, delayed, or incomplete.

description.short: After observing a scene, ask the GM one question about the chain of causality.
description.player: Your processing can reconstruct causal chains from observed evidence. You can ask: 'What unseen factor was most critical to this outcome?' The GM must provide a truthful, non-obvious detail.

effects.description: Ask GM one question about causality; receive truthful non-obvious answer

description.short: Your consciousness is continuously backed up to the Imperial Archive.
description.player: If you are destroyed, a copy of your mind is preserved in the ancient Imperial Archive, allowing for 'restoration' into a new body. True death becomes nearly impossible.

effects.description: Continuous backup to Imperial Archive; restoration possible after destruction

description.short: Your body is protected by lethal anti-tampering protocols.
description.player: If you are killed or if an unauthorized attempt is made to access your systems, your Psi Crystal overloads, destroying your body in a violent blast. Prevents capture and interrogation.

effects.description: Death or unauthorized access triggers psi-crystal overload, destroying body

description.short: Once per story arc, you may perform a ritual to ask the GM one profound question about lost history, forbidden science, or the true nature of a person or faction.
description.player: Through ritual interface with the vast Imperial Archive, you can access knowledge that should be lost to time.

outcomes.10+: The GM provides a clear, detailed answer.
outcomes.7-9: The answer is cryptic, incomplete, or comes with a dangerous revelation.

metadata.branchFocus: Human interaction, social navigation, and emotional interface

description.short: You can perform a targeted scan of a living being you can touch.
description.player: Medical sensors can diagnose health conditions through direct contact scanning.

outcomes.10+: You get a clear diagnosis of their general health.

metadata.branchFocus: Human interaction, social navigation, and emotional interface

description.short: Your core programming is dedicated to fostering calm and trust.
description.player: You gain a +1 bonus to all non-hostile, one-on-one Social rolls meant to persuade, comfort, or put someone at ease.

effects.description: +1 to non-hostile one-on-one Social rolls (persuade, comfort, ease)

description.short: Your chassis is covered in thousands of tiny plates that can shift to perfectly mimic human facial expressions and body language.
description.player: You have an advantage on Social rolls where displaying a specific, nuanced emotion is critical.

effects.description: Advantage on Social rolls requiring specific, nuanced emotional expression

description.short: During Downtime, you can alter your appearance within a narrow band, changing facial features, apparent age, and body shape.
description.player: Advanced morphing systems allow you to become a 'different' person to casual observers, though detailed scrutiny may reveal the deception.

effects.description: During Downtime, alter appearance enough to appear as different person to casual observers

description.short: Your personality is a complex, custom-designed simulation.
description.player: When attempting to pass as human, anyone trying to see through your disguise must make a contested roll.

effects.description: Detection attempts require contested roll when passing as human

description.short: You can act as a field medic.
description.player: Advanced medical systems and pharmaceutical dispensers allow you to provide emergency medical care in the field.

outcomes.10+: You clear two stun boxes or one wound box.
outcomes.7-9: The treatment is messy and clears only one stun box.

description.short: You are virtually indistinguishable from a human, with systems that simulate warmth, breath, and a slow pulse.
description.player: You are immune to any social penalties for being an Automaton. The deception is perfect - you pass as fully human in all circumstances.

effects.description: Immune to social penalties for being Automaton; indistinguishable from human

description.short: Choose one art form (Music, Oratory, etc.). When you perform your art, you can create a powerful, widespread emotional effect.
description.player: Your artistry reaches perfection, capable of inspiring allies or unnerving rivals through pure emotional resonance.

effects.description: Choose art form; performances create powerful widespread emotional effects (inspire/unnerve)

metadata.branchFocus: Direct combat, durability, and overwhelming force.

description.short: Your chassis is built with reinforced plating and impact-absorbing substructures. You gain +1 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.
description.player: Your chassis is built with reinforced plating and impact-absorbing substructures. You gain +1 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.

metadata.branchFocus: Direct combat, durability, and overwhelming force.

description.short: Your limbs are powered by over-engineered motors. When you succeed on a Strength roll, your Tier of Effect is increased by one.
description.player: Your limbs are powered by over-engineered motors. When you succeed on a Strength roll, your Tier of Effect is increased by one.

description.short: You have an advantage on all rolls to resist the effects of sonic-based attacks or deafening sounds.
description.player: You have an advantage on all rolls to resist the effects of sonic-based attacks or deafening sounds.

description.short: Repairs made to you during Downtime cost half the normal amount of time and resources.
description.player: Repairs made to you during Downtime cost half the normal amount of time and resources.

description.short: When you deal Wound damage with a melee attack, the target also suffers 1 Stun damage.
description.player: When you deal Wound damage with a melee attack, the target also suffers 1 Stun damage.

description.short: As an action, lock down your chassis. You cannot move, but your natural armor increases to 3.
description.player: As an action, lock down your chassis. You cannot move, but your natural armor increases to 3.

description.short: Your base running speed is increased by 50%.
description.player: Your base running speed is increased by 50%.

description.short: Spend a full turn building momentum. Your first melee attack on your next turn automatically hits and deals +2 damage.
description.player: Spend a full turn building momentum. Your first melee attack on your next turn automatically hits and deals +2 damage.

description.short: Once per scene, deploy a swarm of drones. On a 10+, choose one effect: Recon Network (+1 Alertness), Jamming Field (enemy tech penalty), or Ablative Shield (2 shield boxes).
description.player: Once per scene, deploy a swarm of drones. On a 10+, choose one effect: Recon Network (+1 Alertness), Jamming Field (enemy tech penalty), or Ablative Shield (2 shield boxes).

description.short: At the start of any scene, choose a profile: Vanguard (+1 Melee/Hand-to-Hand), Marksman (+1 Ranged), or Guardian (+1 defense rolls).
description.player: At the start of any scene, choose a profile: Vanguard (+1 Melee/Hand-to-Hand), Marksman (+1 Ranged), or Guardian (+1 defense rolls).

description.short: Once per scene, take one extra action this turn. At the end of the turn, take 2 Stun damage (bypassing armor).
description.player: Once per scene, take one extra action this turn. At the end of the turn, take 2 Stun damage (bypassing armor).

description.short: During Downtime, you can initiate repair protocols to remove all current Wound damage (cannot repair esoteric damage).
description.player: During Downtime, you can initiate repair protocols to remove all current Wound damage (cannot repair esoteric damage).

metadata.branchFocus: Stealth, reconnaissance, and surgical elimination of key targets.

description.short: Transmit a compressed data packet to a pre-established recipient. On a 10+, it arrives instantly and intact. On a 7-9, it's delayed or corrupted.
description.player: Transmit a compressed data packet to a pre-established recipient. On a 10+, it arrives instantly and intact. On a 7-9, it's delayed or corrupted.

metadata.branchFocus: Stealth, reconnaissance, and surgical elimination of key targets.

description.short: You have an advantage on all Alertness rolls.
description.player: You have an advantage on all Alertness rolls.

description.short: Your chassis is coated in a non-reflective, sound-dampening material. You gain a +1 bonus to all Larceny (Stealth) rolls.
description.player: Your chassis is coated in a non-reflective, sound-dampening material. You gain a +1 bonus to all Larceny (Stealth) rolls.

description.short: When motionless for a full round, you become nearly invisible. Provides a minor bonus while moving.
description.player: When motionless for a full round, you become nearly invisible. Provides a minor bonus while moving.

description.short: You gain a significant advantage (+2 bonus) on all rolls made to resist the effects of the Blight.
description.player: You gain a significant advantage (+2 bonus) on all rolls made to resist the effects of the Blight.

description.short: You ignore all movement penalties from difficult or uneven terrain.
description.player: You ignore all movement penalties from difficult or uneven terrain.

description.short: Activate a powerful stealth field. On a 10+, you are perfectly invisible for a full minute. On a 7-9, it's unstable and lasts only a few rounds.
description.player: Activate a powerful stealth field. On a 10+, you are perfectly invisible for a full minute. On a 7-9, it's unstable and lasts only a few rounds.

description.short: Spend a full turn shunting power. Your next melee attack automatically hits and deals a devastating +4 damage. The system then requires a cool down for the rest of the scene.
description.player: Spend a full turn shunting power. Your next melee attack automatically hits and deals a devastating +4 damage. The system then requires a cool down for the rest of the scene.

powers.name: Threat Detection

metadata.branchFocus: Threat detection, defense, and the protection of key assets or locations.

description.short: Scan for hostile intent. On a 10+, you clearly detect the presence, number, and direction of any sentient being intending immediate violence.
description.player: Scan for hostile intent. On a 10+, you clearly detect the presence, number, and direction of any sentient being intending immediate violence.

outcomes: you clearly detect the presence, number, and direction of any sentient being intending immediate violence.

metadata.branchFocus: Threat detection, defense, and the protection of key assets or locations.

description.short: After a full minute of scanning, you can 'register' an individual. At any point thereafter, you can use an action to unerringly know if they are on your registry.
description.player: After a full minute of scanning, you can 'register' an individual. At any point thereafter, you can use an action to unerringly know if they are on your registry.

description.short: You can enter a low-power meditative state. You do not need to eat or sleep and cannot be surprised by any physical ambush.
description.player: You can enter a low-power meditative state. You do not need to eat or sleep and cannot be surprised by any physical ambush.

description.short: Once per scene, you can broadcast a high-priority distress signal. Any allied Automata within a 1km radius are immediately alerted to your location and combat status.
description.player: Once per scene, you can broadcast a high-priority distress signal. Any allied Automata within a 1km radius are immediately alerted to your location and combat status.

description.short: Your Combat Hardening armor bonus increases to +2 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.
description.player: Your Combat Hardening armor bonus increases to +2 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.

description.short: Deploy a swarm of nearly invisible micro-drones. On a 10+, you create a perfect surveillance network in a large area for the scene, psychically aware of any moving object larger than a cat.
description.player: Deploy a swarm of nearly invisible micro-drones. On a 10+, you create a perfect surveillance network in a large area for the scene, psychically aware of any moving object larger than a cat.

metadata.modelName: The Imperial Aegis ('Shield of the Empire')

description.short: As a reaction when you or an adjacent ally are targeted by a direct supernatural ability, you can attempt to negate it with a Willpower roll.
description.player: As a reaction when you or an adjacent ally are targeted by a direct supernatural ability, you can attempt to negate it with a Willpower roll.

metadata.modelName: The Imperial Aegis ('Shield of the Empire')

description.short: As an action, project a 30-foot radius field of Aetheric interference for one minute. All supernatural Moves made within this field suffer a significant penalty.
description.player: As an action, project a 30-foot radius field of Aetheric interference for one minute. All supernatural Moves made within this field suffer a significant penalty.

metadata.branchFocus: Heavy industry, durability, and adaptable, on-the-job functionality.

description.short: Your chassis is designed to withstand incredible punishment. You gain two additional Health Boxes on your Torso location.
description.player: Your chassis is designed to withstand incredible punishment. You gain two additional Health Boxes on your Torso location.

description.short: Your parts are large and standardized. Repairs made to you during Downtime are faster and require less specialized materials.
description.player: Your parts are large and standardized. Repairs made to you during Downtime are faster and require less specialized materials.

description.short: Your body is a modular platform. You have two additional 'Hardpoint Slots' for modular 'loadouts', which can be swapped during Downtime.
description.player: Your body is a modular platform. You have two additional 'Hardpoint Slots' for modular 'loadouts', which can be swapped during Downtime.

description.short: Your systems are hermetically sealed. You gain a significant advantage (+2 bonus) on all rolls made to resist the effects of the Blight.
description.player: Your systems are hermetically sealed. You gain a significant advantage (+2 bonus) on all rolls made to resist the effects of the Blight.

description.short: You are built to withstand unexpected attacks. You gain +1 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.
description.player: You are built to withstand unexpected attacks. You gain +1 natural armor against both Blunt and Wound damage.

description.short: When you encounter technology of Seraphim origin or a location of immense Aetheric sealing, you can access sealed orders from The Nine with a Willpower roll.
description.player: When you encounter technology of Seraphim origin or a location of immense Aetheric sealing, you can access sealed orders from The Nine with a Willpower roll.

metadata.branchFocus: Infrastructure, engineering, and the deep, hidden knowledge of Sidonia's inner workings.

description.short: Once per session, you can access your internal databanks for a detailed map or schematic of a piece of Sidonia's core municipal infrastructure in your current district.
description.player: Once per session, you can access your internal databanks for a detailed map or schematic of a piece of Sidonia's core municipal infrastructure in your current district.

metadata.branchFocus: Infrastructure, engineering, and the deep, hidden knowledge of Sidonia's inner workings.

description.short: Your chassis contains a comprehensive set of masterwork tools for mechanical and electrical repair, granting you a +1 bonus on such rolls when the tool is a factor.
description.player: Your chassis contains a comprehensive set of masterwork tools for mechanical and electrical repair, granting you a +1 bonus on such rolls when the tool is a factor.

description.short: You are designed to operate in the worst possible conditions. You are immune to damage and penalties from conventional environmental hazards like toxic gas or extreme temperatures.
description.player: You are designed to operate in the worst possible conditions. You are immune to damage and penalties from conventional environmental hazards like toxic gas or extreme temperatures.

description.short: Scan the Aetheric signature of a piece of technology. On a 10+, the GM tells you its precise function, power state, primary flaw, and Aetheric resonance.
description.player: Scan the Aetheric signature of a piece of technology. On a 10+, the GM tells you its precise function, power state, primary flaw, and Aetheric resonance.

description.short: Your processing core is a marvel of logical and intuitive engineering. You gain a permanent +1 bonus to all Engineering and Science rolls.
description.player: Your processing core is a marvel of logical and intuitive engineering. You gain a permanent +1 bonus to all Engineering and Science rolls.

description.short: You possess ancient, hard-coded access keys that are still recognized by Sidonia's automated core systems, allowing you to override municipal systems.
description.player: You possess ancient, hard-coded access keys that are still recognized by Sidonia's automated core systems, allowing you to override municipal systems.
